text: Yury Shamayev (Russian: Юрий Шамаев; born 15 April 1947) is a Soviet rower. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich with the men's coxed four where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Yury Shamayev
